## Properties

| Property           | Attribute            | Description                                                              | Type      | Default |
| ------------------ | -------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `toggleFullScreen` | `toggle-full-screen` | Indicates whether the chat messenger can be toggled to full screen mode. | `boolean` | `false` |
